channel.title: Plugin on huyixi's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Plugin on huyixi's Blog

item.title: Raycast Plugin: Get Time
item.description: Last week, during some spare time, I worked on a Sidebar Project: a Raycast plugin that allows you to get the current time in a specified format. When writing blog entries, I often need to get a precise timestamp (to help recall my thoughts later). However, since I use Apple’s built-in input method, I can’t simply type sj to get the current time like with Sogou or other Chinese input methods.
